daily_prompts.prompt: What are you grateful for today, {name}?
What boundary do you need to set today, {name}?
What would you tell your younger self right now, {name}?
What are you afraid to say out loud today, {name}?
What pattern in your life are you ready to break, {name}?
How did you show up in your relationships today, {name}?
What emotion are you avoiding right now, {name}?
How are you different today than you were a year ago, {name}?
What do you need to forgive yourself for, {name}?
What do you really want, {name}, underneath all the 'shoulds'?
What would you do if you weren't afraid, {name}?
What is your body trying to tell you today, {name}?
What truth about yourself have you been avoiding, {name}?
Who in your life needs to hear something from you, {name}?
How can you be kinder to yourself today, {name}?
How are you sabotaging your own growth, {name}?
What dream have you given up on, {name}?
Who are you when no one is watching, {name}?
What are you pretending not to know, {name}?
What feeling are you most comfortable with, {name}? What does that tell you?
What did you need to hear as a child that you can give yourself now, {name}?
When did you last act against your values, {name}? What happened?
How do you abandon yourself in relationships, {name}?
What story about yourself are you ready to rewrite, {name}?
What are you rushing toward, {name}? What are you rushing away from?
How did you express your creativity today, {name}?
What are you most afraid people would think if they really knew you, {name}?
Where do you hold tension in your body, {name}? What is it protecting?
What conversation are you avoiding, {name}?
How would you comfort your best friend if they were feeling what you're feeling, {name}?

categories.self_awareness: Building consciousness about thoughts, feelings, and behaviors
categories.boundaries: Learning to protect energy and set healthy limits
categories.inner_child: Healing and nurturing the wounded child within
categories.self_compassion: Cultivating kindness and acceptance toward self
categories.desires: Connecting with authentic wants and needs
categories.fear: Working with anxiety, worry, and avoidance
categories.body_wisdom: Tuning into physical sensations and body intelligence
categories.dreams: Exploring aspirations, goals, and life vision
categories.identity: Understanding core self and personal values
categories.values: Clarifying what matters most and living accordingly
categories.creativity: Expressing authentic self through creative outlets

difficulty_levels.gentle: Safe, nurturing prompts for building trust and comfort
difficulty_levels.medium: Moderate depth requiring some vulnerability and reflection
difficulty_levels.challenging: Deep, potentially triggering prompts requiring emotional courage
